alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 1:18PM EST until January 14 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches in the northwest portion of Crawford County. * WHERE...Crawford county. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The main impacts in Crawford County will be northwest of Meadville. A widespread inch or two of snowfall will be expected tonight and transition to lake effect snow with a couple more inches expected on Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
